title: What Is To Be Done
author: CJ The X
notes: This is the article that convinced me to start this website. It's very persuasive, and a beautifully written manifesto for returning to simpler times for the Internet.

title: Outside
author: Brandon Sanderson
notes: This brilliant piece of writing from one of my favourite authors on his personal journey, and who he is.

title: Don’t sacrifice the wrong thing
author: Henrik Karlsson
notes: Henrik Karlsson's work is gold as always. This piece is about finding your priorities. It’s a beautiful read.

title: Give yourself permission to be creative
author: Ethan Hawke
notes: This TED talk is something I come back to every 6 months or so, it is quite beautiful. Art is our way of interfacing with the extremes of emotion. Making sense of our place in the world. Learn to always be okay with playing the fool.
